name: Cascade Surfer
description:
A game made in three days for the MiniJam:104!

Play this if you want carpal tunnel syndrome :)

Controls

-Use your Mouse to move the cascade surfer around, but beware, your stamina is finite. To recover, Press LMB and RMB after one another repediately.

-Pause with P

-Restart level with r

List of thing i could'nt add because of time constrains (and definitely not because i'm lazy):

-a use/ function for colectable stars / visualize amount of stars collected

-polish

-a few bugs in level

-idk if level 3 is possible ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

-locked levels/ progression
